title: In a Future Filled With Electric Cars, AM Radio May Be Left Behind
description: Carmakers say electromagnetic interference causes static and noise on AM transmissions, annoying customers. Broadcasters say they could lose a connection to their core listeners, who rely on the radio for emergencies.

title: The New Chat Bots Could Change the World. Can You Trust Them?
description: Siri, Google Search, online marketing and your child’s homework will never be the same. Then there’s the misinformation problem.

title: The New Chat Bots Could Change the World. Can You Trust Them?

title: Lina Khan, Aiming to Block Microsoft’s Activision Deal, Faces a Challenge
description: Ms. Khan, the chair of the Federal Trade Commission, has staked an ambitious trustbusting agenda on a case that may be difficult to win.
